row.process:
:SET &resultlinestart# = "NO" :SET &resultlinecount# = 0 :SET &result# = "" :SET &diffCount# = 0 :SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.VARA.TEMP.PP_FIND_ENTRY.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :SET &count# = 0
:IF &UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT# <> "NONE" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :ENDIF
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*result count:*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &index# = STR_FIND(&line#, "result count:") ! index = index + lengh of "result count:" : SET &index# = ADD(&index#, 13) : SET &diffCount# = STR_CUT(&line#, &index#) : SET &diffCount# = STR_TRIM(&diffCount#) : PRINT "Result count: &diffCount#" : TERM_PROCESS :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &hnd#
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : IF &UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT# <> "NONE" : IF &diffCount# <> 0 : IF STR_FIND(&line#, "INFO: result:") > 0 : SET &resultlinestart# = "YES" : ELSE : IF &resultlinecount# >= &diffCount# : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : IF &resultlinestart# = "YES" ! resultlinecount += 1 : SET &resultlinecount# = ADD(&resultlinecount#, 1) : IF &line# <> "" : SET &result# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &count# = ADD(&count#, 1) : SET &key# = &count# : set &value# = &result# : SET &key# = FORMAT(&key#, "") : PUT_VAR &variableName#, "&key#", "&UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT#", "&value#" : ELSE : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : WAIT 0 :ENDPROCESS
:PSET &UC4RB_OUT_COUNT# = &diffCount# :IF &UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT# <> "NONE" : IF &diffCount# <> 0 : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_SEARCH_RESULT# = "&variableName#" : ENDIF :ENDIF
